episodes.title: How Picasso, Van Gogh And Cézanne Helped Finance Epstein Client Leon Black’s Billionaire Lifestyle
episodes.description:
The Epstein files detail private equity tycoon Leon Black’s massive, multi-billion-dollar art collection—and how he leveraged it to grow his wealth.

Read the full story on Forbes: https://www.forbes.com/sites/johnhyatt/2026/02/07/how-picasso-van-gogh-and-czanne-helped-finance-epstein-client-leon-blacks-billionaire-lifestyle/

episodes.title: Epstein Could Have Made $100 Million On A Secret Police Tech Investment
episodes.description:
Former Israel prime minister Ehud Barak helped the convicted sex trafficker quietly invest $1 million in a police tech startup in 2015. Its founder said the company, which is set to be acquired by Axon for $625 million, wasn’t aware of Epstein’s involvement.

Read the full story on Forbes: https://www.forbes.com/sites/thomasbrewster/2026/02/10/epstein-police-surveillance-investments-with-ehud-barak/
